reviewText: It is a good film, but unfortunately I can not make a comment because I did not watch the whole film.  Some of the DVD set has been damaged, and I only learned some parts of film.

The 'Sunzi' named here is not the supposed author of the "Art of War."  Rather, he is most likely to have been his grand or great-grandson.  Use this is conjunction with Styefan H. Verstappen's excellent little book, "The Thirty-Six Strategies of Ancient China."  The two give real insight into the strategic thinking of very original minds.
